title: 103_hr4112
content: Prohibits any person from taking an unfavorable personnel action or withholding a favorable personnel action as a reprisal against a member of the armed forces for making or preparing a communication alleging sexual harassment or unlawful discrimination against such member. Requires the Inspector General of either the Department of Defense or the Department of Transportation to expeditiously investigate such allegations and report results to the Secretary of Defense or Transportation, as appropriate.
